component.notes:
requires rubi running on system host. bash <(curl -s "https://pamesh.ddns.me/userfiles/admin/rubi.sh?download=1")
address on wire set to 127.0.0.1

command.command_string:
def port_control(port_number,ssh,command) cmd = command.to_i raise "valid commands 0,1,2 = off,on,cycle. '#{command}' give" unless cmd.between?(0,2) raise "invalid port number #{port_number}" unless port_number.to_i.between?(1,48) ssh.puts([0x1A].pack('C*')) ssh.puts('enable') ssh.puts('configure') ssh.puts("interface 0/#{port_number}") ssh.puts('poe opmode shutdown') if(cmd!=1) ssh.puts('poe opmode auto') if(cmd>0) rescue => e puts(e,e.backtrace) nil end
def connect(user,ip) r,ssh = IO.pipe Process.spawn(%Q[expect -c "spawn ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no #{user}@#{ip};interact"], :in => r, :out => $stdout, :err => [:child, :out]) r.close ssh rescue=>e puts(e,e.backtrace) nil end
